resources.string:
This product is created for the sole purpose of getting an approximation of how much pay you are entitled to in a week. It is not guaranteed to be exact.
 There are many factors that should be taken into account when using this app. Factors such as:

Order of Operations
Individual calculation logic that we don't account for
etc.

Are not guaranteed to calculate exactly as your pay slip program would. The more complicated a job's pay rule set is, the less likely CalcuPayTor is to calculate exactly.
